title: Short-Intensive Online-Based Medical Education Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge with no teaching experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining online modules and PBL for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can complete PBL tasks tailored to real educational scenarios by applying five core educational technologies (instructional design, clinical education, learning facilitation, professional development, assessment strategies)
Learners can analyze educational theories and practical application cases using online modules provided via the Moodle platform and achieve over 80% comprehension
Learners can reflectively evaluate their own educational approaches and establish improvement plans based on peer feedback and tutor coaching
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
